post.body: *hugs* I hate it when these things hapen ;__;;; Hang in there Maiki!!!
You can do it Febby!!! You and Rune awesome partners xD Both of you draw amazing Hibari v v FIGHT :333
Happy Birthday!!! It s a bit early here, but what the hell xDDD <3 from me and KL! :33
LOL they're too lazy to go xDD
Really? O_O!! Go draw more xDDD v
Awww///;;;; Thankyou ;_; Yeah! Luke! I love him a lot lol
Really?? I thought being in the fandom for 1yr+ you would have more than that.... I guess it depends on the artist lol
I want one right now -_-;;;
can't help it ;_;;;; *dies*
*wishes you luck* XDDDbbb
My mindset's like that LOL I have more mindfuck and non-con ones coming up XD; It's what I like .. so... xD;;;;
I hope it won't turn out so bad for you;;; *hugs* ;_;
congrats!!! *hugs*~!!! v v
yah! but I have to work on my copy bon right after.. so.. not yet LOL thanks~v
Oh!! hehe thanks xD I was just wondering cuz their url has "acute girls " in it lol
>_> <_< no one is going to come to my table with negahyst beside me!!! lol
Thankyou yunyun :3 *huggles* :D
Lol true xD deadline is the 9th ^^ and then again on the 16th haha xD
Thankyou ;o; I shouldn't whine like that LOL;; *hugs*
I'm sorry to complain >_< Everyone goes through it and not just me;; gah sorry; I'm just feeling it atm.. ;_; Thankyo ...
most of mine are drawings with reallllyyy bad lines lol WHAT! your faces are sexy XDDD
Oh my average is 3 a day too. If I need to I can up it.. but it's nothing impressive, I'm still slow... you're fast lol
You think so? Maybe it's still too slow ;_l but thankyou! let's fight hard ^^
yeah... but I can't afford to do nothing D: I try to have fun and not think about it ^^ Jumbo hotdog weiner remember!??? haha
Thankyou so much ;__; Mocha power lol!!
Yeah. I did something stupid yesterday, I overwrote some of my 2nd doujin psd. I was actually redrawing it earlier today ;_;
Is it too serious? Lol I really wish I did get paid for it LOL;;;
It's good that it makes you happy~~ its the best feeling :D :D!!
As much as I would love to, it's not possible lol it's just a hobby.. xD;
so expensive;;;;; B-but school's important ;o;;
It was rush-tastic work so I'm glad you don't have it actually LOL
It's out already :3 http://moecon.net/area27/off/published.html <--that top one xD I think I forgot to talk about it xD;
omg ew thats the one you're looking at!? ummm it's really bad lol;; the newest 1827 is a bit better........ -_-
there's nothing to ref from mine, put mine away Ruka -_-
oh it's 1859 non con LOL yah second part of the story after 8059 xD;
You're not alone xDDD;;;
I can't wait to see 1859 from either of you <3 <3 and speaking of 1859... the cover is stalling the 1859 I have to dra ...
lol yah it was cute~ too bad its not so popular :(
why is it deleted -___-;;; AWWW i wanna see your stories so bad now lol yours and Rune's xD
Draw all 3? xDDDD
take some medicine >o<!!
you're the one that's finished woman LOL what's about the husky and kitten? O_O (I want a husky for a pet..)
Congrats!! v v ^^
You should draw whatever you want :D :D :D:D v v v 80, 50 and 27 is all good (to me LOL) v v
I'm sure you two have such wonderful stories v v I can't wait to get the doujin!! *DIES* ///
DId you finish everything yet? ;o;;;; You really need to rest ;__; and yeah, when a page is lost, it's ARGHH. hang in there ;o;
Im the opposite LOL *wants to see more of your Hibari* XD
I can't wait to see it!!! :3 :3
Chrome is fun xDD omggg I cant wait to see what you drew v v
OMGOMG!! CONGRATS FOR FINISHING FEBBY! Your doujins and the one with Rune!! Thanks for your hard work!!! *HUGS* >w<!!
Thanks ^^ altho we sent it late ... xD;;;; I gotta finish up my email to you xDD v v email ya when I wake up v v
SEKI you have twitter now xDDDDDDDDDd
thankyou!!! past the deadline to cuz it's my fault ^^; so I hope they'll still take it ^^;
I have this thing for takng up things during my other things.. (like anthology work, maro cover LOL);;; yeah.. fight fight ^^
it IS bad xDDD doujin's due TODAY XDDDD;;; I still have all pages to tone/text plus I still have 3 pages to outline LOL
LUCKYY!!! I want those books ;o;;;;
gogogo! I can't wait to see it~~ :33
really?? toothpaste taste depends on the flavor hehe~ I like certain ones lol
Yeah... Tsuna has really big boobs and a really big... guy thing... If see it in Japan I'll probably buy it tho lol
okkies :3 I'll be sure to drink water when I wake up ^^ Thankies Ruka ~~ v v
She also did futanari!Tsuna x girl!Yamamoto.. I dunno where her ideas come from now.. I liked her older works....
Because I don't like her idea of a Yamamoto family.. she has like.. 8? 9? 12??? Yamamotos she made up -_-
Oh seriously??? Ok I'll keep that in mind x___x!! Thankyou :333
LOL that's true xDD a lot of RPGs had to go up against S2 standards for me xD;; I was like, it has to be a perfect file lol
DUDE LOL it was chrono trigger, FF3, FF7 and then Suikoden2 xDD the first 4 rpgs that turned my life around hehe
It makes sense xD eternal sonata is all about the music LOL ~~ mmm just not sleepy x_x maybe~ orz~~
wine bottle(s) x Xanxus.. that's the only thing I can come up with... *dies*;;
LOL yha Xanxus should get out of that basement ASAP. ... next chapter orz. Til then we can see sum sexy elephant!!!
mmm Amano ....flavour.... thats making me hungry @___@
F...Febby.. oi... LOL
NOOO Jalapenos are tasty in food!! oh.. rotten.. okay D: *throws it with Rune* xDD
LOL!!!! the comm xDDDbbbb
*HUGS* Your space was AWESOME luv~~ the poster... TO DIE FOR ;_; I wish you where there~~ but your spirit is~~ v v Congrats~ v v
yeah i saw girls with such cute clothes!!!!!!! *dies* i envy them ;w; lets shop next time together hehe
hehe ^^ everyday will be a celebration until the next event lol. i should eat tho.. *munches on u*
I WISH U TWO WERE HERE. ;______; *steals u both* ;__;
thanks so much!! it was unexpected....;;;; *hugs*
I will~!! They went shopping~Im too tired to go ;w; I wish u were here~~ ;w;
bed
yes, sketches are done. It's going to be crunch time now... I'll be a good girl and stay off the net some more tmr. stay off twitter too..
I drew 90 Tales fanarts so far.... that many!??
I'm SOO aching to draw Luke right now
I drew about 400 Reborn fanarts up to date... not sure if that's a lot or... should I count my doujins+MADS too? O_o
I just ate 4 waffles and a chicken drumstick. i want real food....
instant noodles for breakfast!!
I have to think about what to make for dinner....
Damn it all. Wall space again at the uke!Tsuna only event but RIGHT BESIDE NEGAHYST. (she's A9 im A10) BRB KILLING SELF
How many people are in Negahyst anyway? Are they part of Acute girls or ARE they acute girls but with diff name? *scratches head*
bed...
16-17 I guess O_o Uwaa tmr is MARo cover.. -1 day for doujin lol
blowing my nose on the 1827 toilet paper LOL OHHH put in good use hahahaha
ohhh it's been a while since I cried at how useless I totally am LOL I fail at doujin, I fail at sending stuff out, I just fail in general
OMG TONY TAKA C75 DAKIMAKURA. OMG... prolly expensive tho...
this page is taking so long.. slowing down. :( arghhh >_<
.... I feel so shitty atm
I TALK TO MYSELF A LOT. dinner .. NOW ;_;
7 pages outlined today~ I'm on page 13 lol
I'm finishing up my 7th page~ after dinner I'll work on it more. I'll try not to think so much :(
man 2 more days for the 2nd doujin;; So sleepy.. gunna nap and then start on it .. I only had 3? hours of sleep today? O_O
Thanks guys for the comments.. ;_;
I'm so nervous.... omgomg im sooo frekain nervous!! MARo really made a mistake.. orz
this MARo cover and back cover has got to be one of my longest to cg in the recent years lol;
how theheck do you design anthology covers anyway??? *messes around* orz
O.o... by feb09 I would have made 14 doujins so far O_O
new 1827 out in feb also with the 5927 lol cuz.. the story's already finished and on my HD. heeee
LOL the bank was closed and so was the japanese place.. ITS SUNDAY. I R SMART GAIZ
damn my eyes x___x i need to nap now instead so I can just finish everything in one go x___X brb at 8 am x_x 1.5 hrs of sleep.. lol
6 am hahaha~~ wanna finish all this for a short nap and then it's the finish line *dies*
Both KL and Caim is sleeping on my bed xD cute!!
Dont think I'll accept the studio YOU offer~ they're gunna sell my memos and what i get is my own memo! yeah right lol
gunna go eat first I always forget to eat lollll *needs power to stay up all morning!**
hahaha weeeee lol. work work ^w^bbbbbb
Seriously where do some of these Japanese doujinkas get their stories LOL
I kinda regret buying the doujin where Yamamoto is a 30 yr old painter and Gokudera is a 20-something convicted criminal... I totally lol'd
AHAHAHAHA FERN THATS TOO CUTE. I think we're going to change our copybon story v v v NOT COMPLAINING v v This is a weird pairing LOLL
I didn't eat anything yesterday too. except the leftover piece of small KFC drumstick in the morning. Still not hungry....
I was so sick today I played Eternal Sonata and left PC one for defrag and stuff
Slept at 10:30pm?.. woke up at 2am... I can't have a normal sleeping schedule anymore.. too used to my "couple hours nap"
kay .. almost 3am.. sleep now ~
oh.. my dinner..... my cold KFC chicken.... no time to eat it... i gave all my fries away to my siblings too... not like im hungry now..
kay did some practice for a certain character for copybon.. I think.. maybe I can do it @_@ I'll sleep in tonight!! :D
yaaayy soo happy I got it done!! great work to fern too~!!! ayli didn't kill me .. yay xDD;; lets hope they will accept it tho ^^~~
and .. finished doujin lol. but.. but... LOL.
I want YamaGoku's Oretachi no Yakosoku NOW!! I hope it doesnt sound like oretachi no joy. their next song should be oretachi no AI. v v
O.M.G VARIA SONGS. I LIKE. MAMMON. I LIKE YOURS SQUALO. LUSSURIA. OMG BETTER THAN TSUNA AND CO's. (save for goku's and 8059 duet)
aww finally drawing a scene where only yamamoto and hibari is on the page >o< v
damn it!!! I slept past my alarm!!! I guess I can't just nap for 1.5 hrs.. turned out to be 3.5.... -_-;;
Yay!! McD breakfast!!! firefoxoff, spaz on and time to work when i come back~
Hungry.. wanna bug KL for breakfast...
ohhh man can Bel and Fran get any cuter
*just woke up* *drinks water* lol
Okkies enough checking out other circle's stuff x_x I gotta sleep, my headache's killing me x____x

ショタケシ... what the LOL cute!!! Anchor-sama you have uke-Yama book in your YamaTsuna space~~ hehe

hungry....
*kicks LJ* O_O;
almost 9am still awakkkeeee

I've played all the Suikodens (plus gaiden even tho I didn't know Japanese xD) so far~ didn't finish 5 tho.. ;_; I want Tierkries....
the hell O_O LJ's messing up on me.. my replies to ppl are not showing up x_x maybe I'll go play a bit and then come back? or sleep first...
Everyone's playing P4 but me lol I'll just look forward to new Tales, Suikoden and SO4!! ;w; I miss SO3. Fayt~~ Cliff~~~ ahhh
8am OMMGGG IM STILL AWAKE. should I play eternal sonata?
*just checked webclaps* UGH stupid pressure. They're all getting excited over nothing.... its not that good, art wise. Fern did a great job
7:30am ... still up....I should be sleeping by now. I'm not even working on any work!!! BODY WHY FAIL ME orz
oooo sunrise why so annoying lol
MAIKI IMMA MOLEST HER NOW WHEN I SEE HERRRR. ill imagine molesting everyone who participated in the Altona mania!!!!

will FANGIRL IT WHEN I POST. SHIT. I LUV YOU ALL. FUX FUUUUUXXXX
YOU GUYS ARE TOO MUCH. ALTONA BRAVER , I NEVER LOVE IT SO MUCH MORE
MADE ME FUKKIN CRY. I SWEAR.
and OH SHIT PPL GUESS WAT I GOT FROM MAIKI
i didnt eat from this morning.. 10am? its now 4pm lol~~ eating soon~~
800? 850? sold out in an hour and a half!!! SJFLJSDLKJSAK HOLY SHIIITTTTTTT. Great job everyone! Im still high from C75.
I'm in Febby's room and hanging out with Youko xDDD
